name: Sample Case 7: Utility Collection - Borderline Case
description: A de-identified utility collection that is borderline - dates are close but may warrant review.
raw_text:
UTILITY COLLECTION

Collection Company: UTILITY RECOVERY SPECIALISTS
Original Utility: CITY POWER & WATER
Type: Utility Collection Account

Date Placed: 09/15/2021
Original Default: 04/20/2020
Last Update: 11/2024

Amount: $342
Current: $342

Scheduled Removal: 04/2027

Credit Bureau: TransUnion
notes: This utility collection is properly dated. While the date opened (09/2021) is 17 months after DOFD (04/2020), this is within the 24-month threshold and represents a reasonable time for debt to be placed in collections. The removal date of 04/2027 correctly aligns with 7 years from the DOFD.
